TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProcessInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供有关当前正在执行的进程的信息。

span.span: Provides information on processes currently executing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类返回有关在 ASP.NET 过程模型下运行的 ASP.NET 工作进程的信息。This class returns information about ASP.NET worker processes that are running under the ASP.NET process model. 此类型的对象返回的静态方法通过和。Objects of this type are returned by the static methods and . 这些方法是创建一个初始化的对象的唯一的有用方式。These methods are the only useful ways to create an initialized object. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用的 Microsoft Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 6.0，处理度量值返回类是在 IIS 5.0 隔离模式运行时才可用。If you are using Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0, process metrics returned by the classes are available only if you are running in IIS 5.0 isolation mode. 如果你使用的 IIS 6.0 在辅助进程隔离模式下，禁用 ASP.NET 进程模型和访问时引发异常成员。If you are using IIS 6.0 in worker process isolation mode, the ASP.NET process model is disabled and an exception is thrown when you access members. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ， ， ， ，和属性类。The following code example demonstrates using the , , , , , and properties of the class. 该示例显示。The example displays a . 当单击后，当前显示进程信息。When the is clicked, the current process information is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[ProcessInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ProcessInfo/CS/processinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ProcessInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ProcessInfo/VB/processinfovb.aspx#1)]
